books.title: Project 1
books.about: Sisters learn to live in gratitude for each other.

books.title: Project 2
books.about: Enter a dystopian future where books with ideas are dangerous, controlled and burned.

books.title: Project 3
books.about: Thousands set out from the dust bowl to California in search of better fortunes

books.title: Project 4
books.about: A girl learns to trust the wisdom of her father and not be dismayed by the prejudice around here.

books.title: Project 5
books.about: Man hunts whale with a vengeance. In the end, he's the last man stand. I guess he won.
